title: Ambient Video Game Music - Outskirts 2
description: Another collection of ambient soundtracks that set the perfect atmosphere for a countryside that neighbours a big city, the sound of cars in the distance and driving by, the local birds chirping and the rain coming down
longDescription:
Dive further into the intricate world of atmospheric soundscapes with our sequel, offering an expanded collection of 10 additional ambience packs that deepen the unique blend of urban and natural sounds from our original collection.

Elevate your game's environments with our enhanced morning chorus of birds, now featuring an expanded repertoire of avian species, each with their unique songs.


This sequel continues to strike a balance between environmental immersion and player engagement. It's an excellent resource for game developers looking for diverse, high-quality ambient noise to set the mood, create tension, or evoke a sense of place in their games.


So, immerse your players further into the engaging city outskirts. This sequel expands upon the previous collection, enhancing the auditory experience and providing new layers of immersion for your games. Let the nuanced soundscape act as a character in its own right, shaping your game world and crafting an even more compelling experience for your players. The encore to your city outskirts experience awaits - an audioscape meticulously designed for the ultimate gaming immersion.



This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OELfRiH-gJ4

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qZtyR4MuflM

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-N54kEuKosQ


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Minutes of audio provided: 30 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
